entry.title: RT Matt Huang: The most important long-term fundamental indicator for crypto/Web3 is the quality of talent inflows. Not only are the inflows still str...
entry.summary: RT Matt Huang The most important long-term fundamental indicator for crypto/Web3 is the quality of talent inflows. Not only are the inflows still strong despite a jittery market… but they appear to be accelerating as many Web2 stock packages are down 50-80%. “The Great Migration of 2022”

entry.title: RT Kristen | CuddleofDeath: Any companies/orgs interested in sponsoring women and non-binary people on their web3 journeys? 🚀 We are @womenbuildweb...
entry.summary: RT Kristen | CuddleofDeath Any companies/orgs interested in sponsoring women and non-binary people on their web3 journeys? 🚀 We are @womenbuildweb3 - a group of hardworking people eager to grow and learn. We have writers, devs, marketers, and much more. Interested? Dm me or reply here :)

👀 👀 👀 Manny (🇨🇦 Vancouver) (🧱,🚀): Giving away 2 @developer_dao NFTs (🧱, 🚀) to join the DAO, thanks to the funds from @DAppaDanDev @web3con @Nazeeh21 and @qedk_ (give them a follow). Main criteria is just enthusiasm and decisions made by end of week. Reply to this thread with people you want to nominate.
